round_best: Develop a dynamic AI-based decision support system that utilizes continuous real-time health monitoring data, such as wearable technology inputs and patient-reported outcomes, to personalize and optimize the timing of treatment initiation for HIV patients without AIDS. This approach can refine current models of treatment timing, providing a more tailored healthcare strategy with potentially higher efficacy and patient adherence.
